ValidationRule.description: Requires Funded On Date before changing Stage to 'Funded'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Funded"), OR( ISBLANK (Funded_On__c), ISBLANK( Funded_Amount__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before moving to the Funded Stage, you must add a Funded On Date and a Funded Amount
